Texts.Chs: 在月球实验室天鹅座山脉II失败后，我们升级了控制系统和程序。我们小心翼翼地不让任何机构成员拥有过高的权限，并让我们所有的工程师检查他们对安全后门的建议。他们的帮助是有用的，但我们也不能过分依赖他们。
Texts.Eng: After the setback on the moon laboratory Zeta Cygnus II, we've upped our containment systems and procedures. We're careful to not let any Occasus members have too high clearance, and to have all our engineers check their suggestions for security backdoors. Their help has been useful, but we should not overrely on such.

Texts.Chs:
内部备忘录#96291

组织的的努力一直都很有帮助，他们给我们带来更多的生物样本。这是我们不能单独完成的事情——作为某种形式的雇佣军，只要他们相信在利用我们的人，而不是相反，他们就非常有用。他们的组织有自己的盲点，但我们也一样。
Texts.Eng:
INTERNAL MEMO #96291

The Occasus has been very helpful in their efforts to bring us more biomass. This is something that we could not have done alone - and as mercenaries of a sort, they are exceedingly useful so long as they believe the are the ones using us, and not the other way around. Their organisation has its blind spots, but so do we all.

Texts.Chs: 这些人类至上主义者认为他们可以借用我们的专业知识，然后在不再需要我们的时候抛弃我们。一群业余人士。我们鲛人经历了无数代人，我们的优越早已磨练而出。
Texts.Eng: These human supremacists think that they can borrow our expertise and then throw us away when we're no longer needed. Amateurs. The Hylotl have had countless generations to hone the shiv of our superiority.
